cu.explanation_en: Setting the number of PUSCH threads to a negative value will cause initialization failure in the scheduler.

du.explanation_en: Setting SSB block power to 100 dBm exceeds the maximum allowed power range, causing transmission failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 區塊功率設定為 100 dBm 超過允許的最大功率範圍，會導致傳輸失敗。
